page.title: 11THE FLINT FLAKE
page.content: { {Beccy}and{Simone}found a piece of {flint}while we were on a school trip at{Lower Darnford Farm}near Ratlinghope for four days.On the first day we went to the old{Portway}track at{Duckley Nap}. The{flint}dates back to the early{Bronze Age .Mr Carruthers our headmaster told us that there were pieces of{flint}found there.So we started looking along the track.We had luck for{Beccy}shouted" I think we have found some{flint}." She pulled a small{flake}out of the ground,shook the mud off and ran to Mr Carruthers . Mr Carruthers said it probably was {flint}and that we would go to the {Museum}in{Shrewsbury}when we got back.
